title: Personal Portfolio
description: Designed and developed a modern, responsive personal portfolio to showcase my skills, experiences, and projects. The site acts as a central hub for potential employers and collaborators to learn more about me and my work.

title: Texas A&M Esports Infrastructure
description: Pioneered the technical infrastructure for Texas A&M Esports, leveraging Docker and AWS-hosted Postgres. The project also involved the development of a robust Discord bot with a secure Nest JS backend for automating membership management, further enhanced by Google Scripts and Flywire integrations.

title: College Notes
description: Designed a Kotlin-based mobile app focused on student notetaking and schedule management. The app is built using Jetpack Compose and follows the MVVM design pattern in a clean architecture framework, offering seamless CRUD functionalities for managing notes, classes, and calendar events.

title: Video Game Design Portfolio
description: Crafted a dedicated website to exhibit my video game projects. The frontend was developed using a combination of JavaScript, React, HTML, and CSS, providing an interactive experience for users.

title: Olympus Navigator
description: Created a Discord bot to assist server members in tracking their progress and goals within a game. The bot utilizes JavaScript for its core functionalities and integrates with a MySQL database to store and manage user-related information.

title: TAMU Personal Page
description: Crafted a personal website as part of a CSCE 315 project. Built purely using foundational web technologies without relying on any frameworks, the site offers a glimpse into my early web development journey.

title: Aggie Geo Genre
